mapper.insert: insert into participant( co_paper_index, co_title, co_price, co_area, co_payday, co_state, co_m_event, co_m_souvenir, co_b_index, m_index ) values('ca_'||co_paper_index.nextval, #{co_title}, #{co_price}, #{co_area}, sysdate, '참가', #{co_m_event}, #{co_m_souvenir}, #{co_b_index}, #{m_index} )
mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_tel, m.m_gender, m.m_nickname, p.co_title, p.co_area, c.co_b_day,p.co_state from member m inner join participant p on m.m_index = p.m_index inner join competition c on p.co_b_index = c.co_b_index where p.co_b_index = #{co_b_index}
mapper.update: update competition set co_b_state = case when co_b_state = '접수종료' then '접수가능' when co_b_state = '접수가능' then '접수종료' else co_b_state end where co_b_index = #{co_b_index}
mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_gender, m.m_tel, m.m_nickname, p.co_state, p.co_title, c.co_b_day from participant p inner join member m on p.m_index = m.m_index inner join competition c on p.co_b_index = c.co_b_index
